name: 5 Card Solitaire
description:
Description

5 Card Solitaire is a fast-paced card game where you need to create the best poker hands. Use the Golden cards wisely, but watch out for the frozen cards and the bombs, or your game might end way too soon! Will you be able to catch all the wanted criminals?

Instructions

  1. Select five cards that are connected by clicking them. Deselect a card by clicking it again. Use the submit button when you have created your hand.
  2. You can only make ten hands per level. It is important to use these hands wisely and create all the required hands to progress to the next level.
  3. Snowflake cards will freeze if you do not use them. Thaw them by creating hands next to them. Bombs must be removed before they count down to zero. Golden cards will give you bonus points!

name: Abracadabra
description:
Description

The magician's toys are all spread out, and he needs your help to sort them. Connecting bunnies to bunnies, cards to cards and doves to doves will do the trick!

Instructions

  1. Click a symbol to select it, and then click another symbol of the same type to start a chain.
  2. You can only connect symbols where is a path between them that includes two turns or less.
  3. By using special tiles, you can make chains out of several different symbols at once!

name: Ace Solitaire
description:
Description

Ace Solitaire is a card game that requires quick thinking and speedy fingers. Match cards that sum up to 11 to clear them away. Make your way through a deck packed with Aces to clear 3 levels of cards puzzles.

Instructions

  1. Make combinations of 2 or more cards that sum up to 11 to clear them away. Clear all three lay-ups before time runs out.
  2. Click on the cards you want to combine, as soon as they sum up to 11 they get cleared automatically. Click on the deck to open up new cards.
  3. All dressed cards are Aces that have the value of 1. Only cards that are not covered by any other card can be combined.

name: Ali Baba
description:
Description

Ali Baba has been captured by the Kings of Thieves. In order to be released, he must impress them with his solitaire skills. Can you solve the solitaire and free Ali Baba?

Instructions

  1. Build the four piles in the top right from Ace to King. Don't make unnecessary moves.
  2. You can only build cards in sequence and suit. Groups of cards can be moved as one.
  3. You can fill empty spaces with any card.

name: Amazon Speed
description:
Description

Drop blocks into the river in order to make spectacular combinations in just a minute. The Speed version adds score multipliers to this beautiful game!

Instructions

  1. Click to release the current block, and press space bar to switch between the blocks. Create combos of 4 or more of a colour to remove blocks.
  2. Your goal is to remove all blocks above the surface. To your aid, you have two powerups that will make it a lot easier.
  3. Using line blasts is the only way to get rid of black blocks. Your score multiplier increases for every black block you remove.

This game is only available to members. Sign up above to play now for free.

name: Amazon Survival
description:
Description

Drop blocks into the river in order to make spectacular combinations, saving endangered species in the process. Amazing powerups and water effects ensures a beautiful and strategic game!

Instructions

  1. Click to release the current block, and press space bar to switch between the blocks. Create combos of 4 or more of a colour to remove blocks.
  2. Your goal is to remove all blocks above the surface. To your aid, you have two powerups that will make it a lot easier.
  3. Make a 3-step combo to get a colour bomb, or make a combo of 6 or more blocks to get a line blast. Using line blasts is the only way to get rid of black blocks.

name: Animal Parade
description:
Description

You are an animal keeper, and your task is to feed all four types of animals their favourite food. The Zebras want carrots, Penguins prefer fish and Lions will only eat meat. The pigs, being pigs, will eat anything you give them.

Instructions

  1. Click and hold the mouse button to draw a path for an animal.
  2. Zebras eat carrots, Lions eat meat, Penguins eat fish and pigs eat everything.
  3. The faster an animal reaches the food, the more points it is worth.

name: Aztec Drop
description:
Description

The Aztec civilization built a series of underground tunnels to worship their gods. They filled them with great treasures to appease the higher powers, and you need those treasures to fund your expedition.

Instructions

  1. Click a block to remove it, and make your sphere fall to the bottom of the tunnel.
  2. The exits have different values, you want to enter the most valuable one in each level.
  3. Some blocks explode, and others will double the score of all exits when you touch them.

name: BB Bathtub
description:
Description

BB Bathtub is the sequel of Goldfish bowl. It has everything that Goldfish bowl has, and much more! Now you have two hooks: one above and one below the surface. The number of items has increased dramatically, and there are more moving objects than ever before!

Instructions

  1. The fishing hooks swing back and forth. Catch the valuable items by sending down the hook at the right time. It will catch the first object it touches. If you catch the same type of object several times in a row, the score is increased.
  2. Click in the upper area to release the upper hook. Click in the lower area to release the lower hook. It will always travel in its current angle.
  3. The Scuba diver, the Submarine and the Toy planes will drop bonus items when you hit them. Try to hit them several times before they disappear. The Ball explodes on impact and will push away any nearby objects.

name: Big Bang
description:
Description

A1 is visiting the King's castle, but does not have enough gas to fuel her space craft all the way home to her home planet. Create fuel by using your electron cannon to split atoms, causing chain reactions whose energy can power her craft.

Instructions

  1. Click an atom to add an electron to it. When an atom has reached its maximum size, further added electrons will make it split, sending electrons in all four directions.
  2. Try to make as long chain reactions as possible, since each 3 atoms that are split in one move will grant you a free electron to use. Make sure you don't run out of electrons to add, or the game will be over!
  3. The later levels introduce green atoms. Green and pink atoms cannot split each others, with the exception of the Lightning atom, that can split any atom. Use them wisely!

name: Block Party
description:
Description

You have been invited to a party with the up and coming stars, and your task is to create a great pop band. Be careful not to include the trashy rockers into your band, or your tour might not be a success!

Instructions

  1. Create rows of three to remove blocks, and make the stars on top of them fall to the stage floor.
  2. Any block can be moved, whether it creates a match or not. If you use a bomb in a vertical combo, it will remove the whole column, if you use it in a horizontal combo, it will remove the whole row!
  3. To maximize your score, try making several of the pop stars fall to the stage floor in just one move!

name: Bomp Bomp
description:
Description

Get ready to Bomp in this truly unique switching game with a stomping beat. Match rows of Bomps of the same colour to clear them away in this addictive puzzle game. Beware of the ticking bombs and use the Star-Bomps to create Amazing special combinations that light up the screen.

Instructions

  1. Clear the Bomps by switching places of two Bomps to create rows or columns with 3 or more Bomps of the same colour.
  2. Click on the two Bomps you want to switch places with your left mouse button. Only Bomps that are touching vertically or horisontally may be switched.
  3. Be sure to clear all Bomb-Bomps before their timers reach zero otherwise it's game over.

name: Bomp Bomp Party
description:
Description

Get ready to Bomp in this truly unique switching game with a stomping beat. Match rows of Bomps of the same colour to clear them away in this addictive puzzle game. Beware of the ticking bombs and use the Star-Bomps to remove the Police Bomps and start the party!

Instructions

  1. Clear the Bomps by switching places of two Bomps to create rows or columns with 3 or more Bomps of the same colour.
  2. Click on the two Bomps you want to switch places with your left mouse button. Only Bomps that are touching vertically or horisontally may be switched.
  3. Remove Police Bomps by using triple star or star + bomb combinations. When they're all gone, the party begins.

This game is only available to members. Sign up above to play now for free.

name: Boneyard Bonanza
description:
Description

Listen up, amigo! You are in charge of the Boneyard, where all the skeletons for the Day of the Dead are created. Create skeletons with all parts of the same colour to launch the bone-rattling bonus mode!

Instructions

  1. Skeleton parts will appear in the middle. Your task is to create skeletons in the six available coffins by clicking where you want a part to go.
  2. If you create a full skeleton with all parts of the same colour, you launch the bonus mode, which is where the big points are scored.
  3. In the bonus mode, you "feed" the bonus skeleton with any part of the same colour. However, you need to stop the bonus mode with a part of another colour to claim the bonus.

name: Brain Game
description:
Description

Play Brain Game and see how smart you are in a number of different ways. One round of Brain Game gives you three different mini games in visual, maths, logic and memory - so you have to use all of your skills. Try to answer as many questions as possible as fast as you can. You will get more points by answering consecutive questions correctly, so stay alert.

Instructions

  1. In Brain Game you get to try how clever you are in maths, visual, logic and memory, so you will need to use all of your skills.
  2. A round of the Brain Game consists of three mini games, each is 45 seconds long. When playing a mini game you will be presented with questions. Try and answer as many as you can as fast as possible.
  3. You will get more points by answering consecutive questions correctly, so stay alert. You will see your development over time in the end of the Brain Game round.

name: Bric-a-Brac
description:
Description

You have gathered an impressive amount of collectibles of little or no monetary value over the years. It is time to clean the duplicates out to make room for some more in your drawers. Make pairs of identical objects to make them disappear!

Instructions

  1. Click an object to select it. Click a second identical object to attempt to match them.
  2. You can only match objects if a line can be drawn with less than two turns between them.
  3. The gravitation differs between levels, and every level has its own timer.

name: Brick Busterz
description:
Description

Click groups of two or more blocks to make them disappear and do it fast to reach the bonus modes. Use the beam to crush blocks by creating falls and collect birds to increase its hang time.

Instructions

  1. Click groups of two or more blocks of the same colour to make them disappear.
  2. Use the beam and birds to crush blocks by creating high falls.
  3. Be fast and accurate to enter the bonus modes.

name: Briscola King
description:
Description

In our version of this classic card game, you play against a single opponent and you need to use the trumps well to win!

Instructions

  1. You have three cards to choose from, click the one you want to play.
  2. The Trump for your round is shown to the right. The card shown will always be your last card.
  3. Make sure to capture the Aces and Threes, since that is where the big points are!

name: Bubble Saga
description:
Description

You are but one of many princesses who want to marry the wealthy prince. You need help from the magical flower. If you pick the petals right, the prince will definitely fall for you!

Instructions

  1. Shoot to create groups of 3 or more bubbles, causing them to burst.
  2. Every consecutive burst will increase the bonus meter, fill it and you get 50% extra points.
  3. The flower will start spinning when you shoot, make sure that it does not touch the edges!

name: Bubble Witch
description:
Description

The three witches are looking for a new addition to their circle. You have been invited to their haunted house to prove your worth. Can you create enough spiders and keep the cauldron bubbling?

Instructions

  1. Aim and shoot with the mouse. Match 3 of the same colour to remove them.
  2. Every shot that bursts bubbles will add a new spider. If you don't burst bubbles, two spiders are removed.
  3. The score for the falling bubbles increase every time they bounce on a spider.

name: Candy Crush
description:
Description

Welcome to the Candy Shop! Which one is your favourite? Crush candy to create special sweets such as striped candy, wrapped candy and rainbow candy. Combine these specials to create spectacular effects such as Super Stripe and Mega-Candy.

Instructions

  1. Create rows or columns with three candies of the same colour to remove them.
  2. Make special combinations with 4 or 5 candies to create special sweets.
  3. Combine the special sweets to create spectacular effects that will crush even more candy!

name: Carnival Shootout
description:
Description

Welcome to the Carnival! In this classic shooting alley game you have to hit as many moving animal targets as possible with your air gun. 3 levels with unique animals on each level and tricky moving targets makes this game more fun than a ride in the rollercoaster. Can you lure out the secret animals from their hiding place?

Instructions

  1. Shoot the moving animals target as they cross the game field. Try to hit each animals target zone for a maximum score. Watch their movement pattern to time your shots right.
  2. Move the aim with your mouse and click to shoot. Click again to reload when the clip is empty. Avoid the animals with the white flags.
  3. You have to achieve the target score on the first levels to progress. If you hit the target zone of an animal with a golden flag this triggers a special animal to appear. Hit the golden ball it is carrying for a special score.

name: Cat Corner
description:
Description

The Cats are all scrambled and need to be brought back to order. Create rectangles where all four corners are of the same colour, and bring in the herring to maximize your score and keep the cats happy!

Instructions

  1. Click and hold your left mouse button to create a rectangle. You need to create rectangles where all four corners have the same colour.
  2. Larger rectangles give more points, and later levels have more cats, making it possible to reach the really high scores.
  3. The powerups need to be in one of the four corners to count. The clock increases your time, the herring increases your score, and the Cool Cat flips all cats of the same colour.

name: Chain Reaction
description:
Description

Stop the rising molecules from reaching the top in this challenging puzzle game. Click away molecules of the same colour to stay alive and collect the golden coins to advance to the next level. Addictive fun for the keen eye.

Instructions

  1. The goal of Chain Reaction is to clear groups of coloured molecules to stop them from rising to the top of the game field.
  2. Clear away molecules by clicking on them with your mouse. If you can remove them they will be highlighted when you move over them.
  3. Grab Midas coins to advance to the next level, the game area will be reset and your score will increase.

name: Circus Surprise
description:
Description

Click large groups of balls, and catch stars for special powerups such as increased multiplier, extra balls and line blasts.

Instructions

  1. Click a group of 2 or more balls to pop them. Larger groups give more points.
  2. Make the stars fall by removing the balloons under them, or include them in a group of 7 or more balls.
  3. The stars will trigger bonus items when they fall into the bonus funnels in the bottom.

name: Cookie Rookie
description:
Description

You are a Cookie Rookie, new in the bakery and still learning the ropes. You need to keep track of your cookies to be able to bake delicious cakes for your customers. If you are out of cookies - you are out of business!

Instructions

  1. Click the cookies and create pairs that match by shape or number to remove the cookies from the table.
  2. click the cookie jar to get a new cookie from the jar when you are stuck.
  3. To complete the level, clear all cookies from the table (except the one next to the cookie jar).

name: Croco Loco
description:
Description

Plan your shots and place your bombs wisely in this inventive bubble shooting game. You can link several bombs together before you blow them up, removing the foliage and releasing the butterflies!

Instructions

  1. Shoot bubbles and match 3 of a colour to remove them. Switch bubbles with the spacebar. If you make several successive matches, you will get special shots.
  2. Ghost bubbles can pass through all colours except one, and bomb droppers can transform up to three bubbles to bombs.
  3. Bombs close to each other will connect. When you have several connected bombs, use your explosive bubbles to detonate all the connected bombs at once.

name: Daisy Defender
description:
Description

Armed with some good old-fashioned pesticide, you are prepared for the coming onslaught. They have come for your daisies. Shoot all the pests before they reach your precious flowers!

Instructions

  1. Aim with your mouse and click to shoot. If you hold down your mouse button, the shot will have a larger splash effect.
  2. Aim ahead of the insects, as your shots are pretty slow.
  3. Grab all the powerups with a + by shooting them, and avoid the ones with a red minus sign on them!

name: Diamond Digger
description:
Description

Work your way down by digging a path for the water to follow. Complete the levels quickly to increase your multiplier, but make sure you don't run out of moves!

Instructions

  1. You have a limited amount of moves. If you run out of them, the game is over. You get new moves for every level you complete.
  2. Going down is good. If possible, always aim for the bottom exit. This will give you more treasures.
  3. When your time is almost up, look for large groups and colour bombs to utilize your high score multiplier.

name: Fairy Solitairy
description:
Description

The Fairy of the Forest invites you to her Magic Mushroom hideaway to help her solve this exciting solitaire. Take a breath of fresh air and start the solving!

Instructions

  1. Build the four piles in the top right from Ace to King. You can fill empty spaces with any card.
  2. You cannot rotate the pile of cards. Check if you have any moves left before picking a new card.
  3. Make sure to use your cards wisely, since every move costs you 100 bonus points.

name: Farm King
description:
Description

In Farm King, you have three days to grow as much as you can. Select your animals or crops of choice, and then make sure that they have water, sun and fertilizer to maximize growth.

Instructions

  1. Select crops and plant them. It will not affect your score.
  2. You have a limited number of moves. Items get worth more after you've made a match next to them.
  3. Fill the targets in the bottom of the screen and go above to increase growth.

name: Flash Diamond
description:
Description

Make large groups of tiles to make the diamonds appear. Gather as many as possible before you collect them all at once. How many diamonds do you dare to save before grab them? Remember, they can be gone in a flash!

Instructions

  1. Click large groups of tiles in order to generate diamonds.
  2. Use the space bar to get a new line of tiles.
  3. Click the diamonds to collect them and end the game.

name: Four Seasons
description:
Description

Four seasons full of frolicking kids dressed in different colours. Create large groups of kids with same-coloured clothes to make them start spinning, and collect all letters in B-O-N-U-S for a score boost!

Instructions

  1. Click on a group of four kids to spin them clockwise. Create groups of at least five kids to make them start spinning.
  2. You cannot move kids that are spinning, but you can add other kids to that group by moving them. Create groups of at least six kids to free bonus letters.
  3. Spell B-O-N-U-S to get bonus points if you complete the level, and complete all four levels before time runs out!

name: Freecell
description:
Description

Freecell is based on the classic Freecell solitaire, but with a special twist! Use the golden cards to your advantage, either to bring forward an obscured card or boost your score!

Instructions

  1. Click and drag a card to move it. Create a sequence of Ace to King in each suit to complete the game.
  2. Use the Golden Cards to bring forward a card that you need. First click the golden card, then click the card you want to bring forward.
  3. You can also use the golden card to add to your score, by clicking the golden card and then your score counter.

name: Gin Rummy
description:
Description

Collect cards that match and get rid of your deadwood as quickly as possible! Will you knock as early as possible, or go for a Gin?

Instructions

  1. Create three or four of a kind or three or more cards in sequence and suit.
  2. All cards that are not in a combination count toward your deadwood.
  3. When your deadwood is below 10, you can knock to determine the winner of the hand.

name: GoGo 21
description:
Description

Are you ready to GoGo 21? In this speedy, classic solitaire game the goal is to make 21 as many times as you can with the cards in the deck. Place your cards well to make those valuable Black Jacks in two fast-clicking rounds of strategic thinking! Use the Joker sparingly. Try to save it till the end to get out of a tight spot and earn more points!

Instructions

  1. GoGo 21 is a card game based partly on the Black Jack rules and way of counting, and the object of the game is to place cards in such a way as to make 21 as many times as possible in each round.
  2. You can place each card in any column as long as the sum does not exceed 21. The current sum of the column is presented above each column.
  3. If you can’t place a card in a column you have to throw it away. Try to keep the number of cards you throw away to a minimum to increase your score.

name: Goldfish Bowl
description:
Description

In this amazingly addictive fishing game you have to catch the most valuable objects with the hook of the fisherman as it swings back and forth. Tons of different levels with challenging puzzles and pretty fish. Is it champagne and caviar for you or is it an old rubber tire that is your destiny?

Instructions

  1. The fishing hook swings back and forth. Catch the valuable items by sending down the hook at the right time. It will catch the first object it connects to. If you catch the same type of object several times in a row the score is increased.
  2. Click in the aquarium area or press the Down Arrow on your keyboard to send the hook down. It will always travel in it's current angle. To use the Extra fishing line press the Up Arrow.
  3. The Sturgeon fish will drop caviar cans when you hit it. Try and hit it several times before it disappears again. The Blowfish explodes on impact and will destroy any nearby objects.

name: Golf Solitaire
description:
Description

Can you clear all three courses? Reach par or lower to move on to the next level, and unlock the bunker cards with your trusty sand wedge. This solitaire is varied and very beautiful.

Instructions

  1. Click a card that is one value higher or lower than the open card in the bottom of the screen.
  2. Reach par or below by removing enough cards to proceed to the next level.
  3. If there are bunker cards, you must first uncover the sand wedge before you can use them.

name: Gospo's Adventure
description:
Description

Place cubes to create groups of three or more of the same colour. Make the Star Catcher touch as many Star Cubes as you can to collect Stars. Try to make the StarCatcher reach the bottom; if it does, you'll score bonus points!

Instructions

  1. Place cubes so you create groups of three or more cubes of the same colour.
  2. Try to make Star Cubes land next to each other. They'll merge together, which increases their value.
  3. Make the Star Catcher touch as many Star Cubes as you can to earn extra moves.

name: Hens' Defense
description:
Description

The chicken farm is under attack from wild animals, and they have come for the eggs! Defend them at all costs by organizing the other animals on the farm to help you out.

Instructions

  1. Place a defense unit by selecting it in the menu to the right, and placing it on the grass.
  2. In the mini-game, get three in a row of the symbol that matches your defense unit.
  3. Build enough defense units to protect yourself against the waves of enemies.

name: Hex Combo
description:
Description

Save the prince from the wicked witch by heating her cauldron. The more you heat it, the more like his former self will the prince become. Will he become a frog, a prince or something in between? Your performance decides in this Honey Combo sequel.

Instructions

  1. Save the prince! You must start on a heated hexagon, and make combinations of 17. The more combinations you make, the more you will heat up the cauldron.
  2. You will proceed to the next level when you have turned all hexagons green or when the time is out, provided that you have managed to turn all hexagons at least red.
  3. If you get stuck and can't find any combinations, try using the bats in the cauldron. The blue swirl mixes all numbers up, whereas the green bat turns the selected numbers into 1's and 0's only.

This game is only available to members. Sign up above to play now for free.

name: Hidden Stories
description:
Description

Every picture hides a number of objects, and it is up to you to discover them! Find all objects listed below the picture, and you will qualify for the bonus mini-game!

Instructions

  1. Normal mode: All items in the list are hidden in the picture. Find them.
  2. “Night mode”: Move the cursor to light up the scene and find all objects in the list.
  3. “Spot the difference mode”: The two pictures are not the same. Find the differences.

name: Honey Combo
description:
Description

Honey Combo is a buzzing Black Jack-based card game, where your goal is to turn all the cells to honey by creating card combinations that sum up to 21 before time runs out. Plenty of different layouts ensure that every new game feels fresh.

Instructions

  1. Honey Combo is a buzzing Black Jack-based card game, where your task is to turn all the cells to honey by creating card combinations that sum up to 21 before time runs out. Turn all the cells to honey to advance to the next level.
  2. You link cells to each other by clicking on them with your left mouse button, and watch as the counter at the bottom of your screen reaches 21. You can only link cells that are next to each other.
  3. All cards have their designated values, except dressed cards, which all have a value of 10, and aces, which can have a value of either 1 or 11.Use the Shuffle option when you are stuck, but remember that you only have a certain amount of shuffles.

name: Hoop de Loop
description:
Description

In Hoop de Loop you want to collect as many jewels as you can before you run out of time. Create jewels by colour matching three balls or more to create chain reactions in a moving train. The longer combos you make, the more valuable jewels you get. Make sure to clear the balls before the train reaches the Volcano to avoid game over. Get all the jewels in the front of the train by activating the Collector. Timing is essential!

Instructions

  1. Shoot the balls to match 3 balls or more of the same colour to clear them before they reach the Volcano.
  2. Make chain reactions to generate bonus jewels that appear in the train of balls. The longer combos you create, the more valuable jewels you will get.
  3. Activate the Collector by shooting two balls in rapid succession at the target above the hole. All jewels in a suite - with no ball in between - at the front of the train will be collected for points.

name: Hungry Animals
description:
Description

In Hungry Animals, your challenge is to feed the four friends with the right food by aiming shots through the field of bubbles. Collect bonus items and bubbles of the right colour to fill up your score. Make that food fly!

Instructions

  1. Feed the animals with their favourite food. Use the slingback and fork and select the food of preference for each animal. Try to include bonus items and bubbles of the right colour before firing away.
  2. The animals are picky and will only settle with their favourite food. Any other food will make your score drop. To aim right, try different angles before you let go!
  3. Hidden in the columns are the B-O-N-U-S letters. Collect them and all food items in the bubble field will delivered to the right animal.

name: I Love Treasure
description:
Description

Help Bonnie the pirate in her search for treasure! Each island is full of hidden bounty. Find the map and discover the location of the Treasure Islands where you can dig up extra booty to boot!

Instructions

  1. Click or drag to move the shells and create a row of three or more to remove them.
  2. Four in a row clears a row or column, and five will fire lightning bolts at all the shells of one colour.
  3. Dig up the map to proceed to the next island where more treasure awaits.

name: I Scream Ice Cream
description:
Description

Create ice cream cones for the kids in all sorts of flavours. The more ice cream you scoop out, the happier the kids will be!

Instructions

  1. Your goal is to scoop up at least as much as the targets for each flavour. Next to each flavour on the ice cream cone you see the target amounts.Scoop up ice- cream by clicking the ice cream inside of the bowl. You can only click groups that have a mouth and eyes.
  2. Save up a big group of a flavour to earn extra moves. You'll need them. Remember that ice cream that gives extra moves has a big smile!
  3. Try to get as many scoops above the flavour targets as possible. One way of doing this is to save one final flavour when the three other have reach their targets. Try to make a group of the final flavour as big as possible before you click it.

name: Itsy Bitsy Spider
description:
Description

Itsy bitsy spider is a web game in every sense of the word. Try to ensnare insects and avoid the wasps and beetles to make the largest and prettiest web of them all.

Instructions

  1. The spider will follow your mouse pointer when possible. Click once to make him leave the web outline, and again if you want him to turn.
  2. Cover areas in your web by encircling them with your spider. The encircled area will be marked as cleared, and your clearing percentage will go up.
  3. Watch out for the wasps and beetles. They have different behaviours, but they share a common goal: to stop you from making your web.

name: Jelly Swelly
description:
Description

In this puzzler, you want to create as many matches as possible with a single move. If a jellyfish is included in both a vertical and horizontal match, it will be splashed and fill your powerup meter!

Instructions

  1. Click and drag with your mouse to flip the Jellyfish. If you create a row or column of four or more jellyfish of the same colour, they will be removed
  2. When the game begins, you can flip up to 4 jellyfish at once, but if you collect both extender powerups, you can flip up to 6 jellyfish at the same time.
  3. Bring the powerups to the bottom of the screen to collect them. The boosters can help you keep the colour meters filled, and the Star increases your scores for a short period of time.

name: Jungle Bubble
description:
Description

Who is the King of the Jungle? Clear all the bubbles hanging from the roof by shooting up bubbles of matching colour. Master the bounce shots and your steady aim to come out on top in this fantastic variation of the most classic bubble buster.

Instructions

  1. The goal of Jungle Bubble is to clear all the bubbles hanging from the roof by bursting them with as few shots as possible.
  2. You burst a bubble by sending up a bubble to create a group of 3 bubbles or more of the same colour.
  3. By directing your arrow you can aim using the dotted sight to shoot the bubble straight up or bounce it off a wall to hit the hanging bubbles.

name: Jungle Speed
description:
Description

Who is the fastest in the Jungle? Clear all the bubbles hanging from the roof by shooting up bubbles of matching colour. You only have a minute, so be quick!

Instructions

  1. The goal of Jungle Speed is to clear as many bubbles as possible within a minute.
  2. You burst a bubble by sending up a bubble to create a group of 3 bubbles or more of the same colour.
  3. Make the multipliers fall down, and use the row blasts to clear bubbles even faster!

This game is only available to members. Sign up above to play now for free.

name: Kalorie King
description:
Description

You need to get in shape! Try to stay off the pizza, hamburgers and candy, and eat carrots, lettuce and apples instead. Many special items will help you, but there are also some that will make the temptation even greater!

Instructions

  1. Pull down bad food and shoot it back up. When things start falling down, avoid the bad food and collect what's good for you!
  2. Catch the special items (Orange background) that fall down for useful effects.
  3. If you release the bad items (black background), you will get punished for it!

name: Katana Kaunto
description:
Description

Click the markers in the proper sequence as fast as possible! Gain extra points by clicking close to the edges of the markers. Five fast levels makes it a clickfest out of the ordinary.

Instructions

  1. When the game starts, you should note what it says on the sword at the bottom of the screen, since this will tell you something about the sequence at hand.
  2. When you click the numbers, try to click on a number only once, so you don't accidentially click the number beneath when the visible marker disappears.
  3. When you have mastered the art of sequential clicking, you should try to click near the edges of the markers, as this will give you more points per click.

name: Keyword
description:
Description

Use your spelling skills to come out on top in Keyword – an exciting word puzzle game where you make the 3 highest scoring words you can find. Search for the best words and use special tiles to increase your score. If you make a word of 5 letters or more you’ll get a chance to try out your spelling skills in the bonus round.

Instructions

  1. Click on the letters to spell the 3 highest scoring words you can find in each round. Spell a word by clicking on the letter tiles in the correct order.
  2. A letter tile can only be used once in each round and only tiles that are touching can be linked together to make a word. Only words containing 3-10 tiles will be accepted.
  3. Make a word of 5 letters or more in at least one of the rounds to qualify for the bonus round. Try to use all of the bonus tiles.

name: King of Hearts
description:
Description

The King's best card players have challenged you to a game of Hearts. Will you be able to beat them and rule the realm of this great card game?

Instructions

  1. Select which cards to send to your opponent. It's good to get rid of a single colour if possible.
  2. Keep track of the Queen of Spades. It is by far the most dangerous card in the deck.
  3. If you have a lot of high cards, maybe you can go for the moon and try to get all hearts and the Queen of Spades?

name: King of Spades
description:
Description

You will have to cooperate to beat the opposing team in this classic card game. Bid wisely, and don't accumulate too many bags!

Instructions

  1. Decide how many tricks you think you will win with your cards.
  2. You have to follow suit, and the highest card will win. The only exception is that spades are trumps.
  3. If you get a trick over your bid, you get a bag. If you get 10 bags, you get a big score penalty!

name: King Pin Bowling
description:
Description

Welcome to the King Pin Bowling Alley. Strike down the pins and show your worth! Realistic controls, believable physics and great sound makes this an alternative to the real thing!

Instructions

  1. Move the mouse to position the ball for your throw.
  2. Grab the ball with your left mouse button and throw it by making a forward movement with your mouse.
  3. Release the mouse button to let go of the ball, and add some spin afterwards by moving the mouse sideways.

name: Klick, Klack & Roll
description:
Description

Klick, Klack & Roll is a new exciting update of Klicker Fusion that introduces a Conveyor belt that separates the game area into two sections. Gather the cubes into larger groups of the same colour for a top score and use the all new Cog Blast to open up a hole in the Conveyor belt to bring them all together. Klick, Klack & Roll challenges you to clear away as many cubes as possible over 3 levels with more and more cubes

Instructions

  1. Your task is to clear away as many cubes as possible. Any group of 2 cubes or more of the same colour that touch horisontally or vertically can be removed. Clear them all before you run out of moves or time. In this all new version of the classic game the game field is divided by a moving conveyor belt.
  2. Gather the cubes into larger groups of the same colour to raise the score; the radioactive cubes double the score when they are part of a removed group so focus on them to get a good score. You have to remove enough cubes on level 1 and 2 to advance to the next level.
  3. Use the Cog blast by clicking the blue button to make a 3-cog hole anywhere in the Conveyor belt to create even larger groups of cubes with good planning. You can only use it once per level. The Bombs are activated when they reach the bottom of the screen and blow up touching blocks. When the red Column Blast button is active you can use it to remove all blocks in a column of your choice.

name: Klicker Fusion
description:
Description

Klicker Fusion is the ultimate puzzle game that combines simple fun with strategic twists. Clear away as many coloured cubes as possible, reach the next level and plan your moves to collect large groups of the same colour to hit that high score. Radioactive blocks improve your score and bombs blast away single blocks that hamper your progress. 3 levels of challenging play and strategic planning.

Instructions

  1. Klicker Fusion is an all new version of the classic puzzle game with new strategic twists and features. Any group of 2 cubes or more of the same colour that touch horizontally or vertically can be removed. Clear them all before you run out of moves or time.
  2. Just click on a group of two or more cubes to clear them away. The cubes above will fall down to fill up empty space. Use smart planning to clear larger groups at a time to increase your score drastically.
  3. The Column Blast can help you to clear away a whole column, and any bomb that touches the bottom of the field gets activated and can be used to blast away lone cubes.

name: Letter Star
description:
Description

Four famous persons are hidden among the scrambled letters. Can you find their last names and figure out their first names? Five different categories will put your names knowledge to the test!

Instructions

  1. Look for names forward and backward, horizontally, vertically and diagonally.
  2. The last names are given, but you must figure out the first names yourself or lose the star bonus.
  3. You can change the font to make it easier to find certain letters in the matrix.

name: Letter Swap
description:
Description

Swap the letters to create words horizontically and vertically. After every swap, you will get points for the words you created.

Instructions

  1. Click two letters to make them swap places.
  2. Words from left to right and top to bottom are counted.
  3. Only words that are lit up are counted. Light up a column and row by swapping a letter there.

name: Luxor
description:
Description

Luxor is an action-puzzler that takes you on an adventure across Ancient Egypt. Use the scarab shooter to destroy Set’s spheres before they reach the pyramids. Use Isis’ magic by catching talismans, gems, and Ankh coins. Can you thwart Set's plans?

Instructions

  1. Move your Scarab Shooter with your mouse, and shoot with your left mouse button. Use space to switch to your next sphere.
  2. Create Combos or Chain reactions to spawn great powerups that you must catch when they fall!
  3. Fill the progress bar to prevent more scarabs entering the game. Don't let the spheres reach a pyramid, or all is lost!

name: Magic Spinball
description:
Description

Magic Spinball is a unique twist of the classic Breakout game where you have to break all the bricks to progress. Move the paddle to bounce the ball at the bricks above and collect a huge range of cool powerups to help you on your way. Masses of amazing levels with several degress of difficulty and special blocks to keep you on your toes.

Instructions

  1. Clear 3 levels of bricks by bouncing the ball with your paddle. Clear them all to advance to the next level. Grab the falling special features and use them to clear the levels faster.
  2. Move the paddle sideways with your mouse to keep the ball from dropping out. Release the ball, shoot the laser and the rocket with your left mouse button.
  3. Lasers and Rockets help you to destroy the bricks faster. You have to clear a level within the time limit to progress. You can escape early when the Warp hole opens.

name: Mahjong Golden Path
description:
Description

Unlock the Golden Path to the land of the gods by setting the runes free. Unlock new lands as you collect golden coins, and choose from several unique sets of tiles with powerful runes and beautiful artwork.

Instructions

  1. Click two identical tiles to remove them. They have to be free on at least one side, and not be covered.
  2. Free the special Rune Tiles to open the golden path to the next level.
  3. There are no shuffles, so if you are stuck it is game over unless you have uncovered one or more Rune Tiles.

name: Mahjong Masquerade
description:
Description

You are the director, and you have an extraordinarily forgetful ensemble of actors. You need to help them find other actors wearing the same masks, but they can only remember two lines. Find an easy path between the actors, and tell them where to go.

Instructions

  1. Click a mask to select it. Click another mask to match them. The closest path between the two masks can only include two turns, or the move will be impossible.
  2. You can make moves that requires the path to go outside the playing field if that is necessary to make the move possible.
  3. If you click two different masks, or if you click two masks that cannot be matched at the moment, a red line will appear, and you will get a score deduction.

name: Mahjong Treasure
description:
Description

Mahjong Treasure is a Mahjong puzzler with some subtle innovations. Create perfect or standard matches when you dig through the tiles to reach the treasure. Hexagonal tiles and three levels ensure a challenging and fresh experience.

Instructions

  1. Match the tiles by finding matching pairs before you run out of time. If you match numbers with the same background colour, you will receive a higher score. Clear a level to advance the next, harder level.
  2. To be able to remove a tile it has to be free to move. This means that it cannot have another tile that covers any part of it, and it has to have three connected sides free.
  3. Tiles that are free to move are of a slightly brighter colour. Use the Shuffle option when you are stuck, but if there were remaining pairs you could have cleared you get a time deduction.

name: Mahjong Wonderwall
description:
Description

Mahjong has never been this beautiful! Do not let the breathtaking scenery distract you from your goal: to clear the 3-dimensional puzzle by matching symbols. Take your time and find the optimal way to maximize your score.

Instructions

  1. No stress! This is a game where it pays to think about your moves before you make them.
  2. Look for the shaking tiles. They include jewels, and should be matched as late as possible.
  3. Every third correct move will result in glowing tiles. Matching them will increase your multiplier!

name: Masquerade Maze
description:
Description

You are the director, and you have an extraordinarily forgetful ensemble of actors trapped in a maze. You need to help them find other actors wearing the same masks, but they can only remember two lines. Find an easy path between the actors, and tell them where to go.

Instructions

  1. Click a mask to select it. Click another mask to match them. The closest path between the two masks can only include two turns, or the move will be impossible.
  2. You can make moves that requires the path to go outside the playing field if that is necessary to make the move possible.
  3. If you click two different masks, or if you click two masks that cannot be matched at the moment, a red line will appear, and you will get a score deduction.

This game is only available to members. Sign up above to play now for free.

name: Match Blocks Speedtrap
description:
Description

In this quick version of Match blocks, you must try to remove the blocks with as few moves as possible. Remove them by isolating them or matching them in pairs. Bombs will make your life more difficult, so clear them quickly. Complete as many levels as possible within the time limit.

Instructions

  1. Match two identical blocks to make them disappear. You can also isolate them by removing all adjacent blocks, which gives a higher score than matching.
  2. When a bomb appears, you must isolate it by removing all blocks adjacent to it before its counter has reached zero. Every move will make the counter tick.
  3. Remove all blocks adjacent to the golden level blocks to complete the level. Try using as few moves as possible to get a high bonus score.

This game is only available to members. Sign up above to play now for free.

name: Midas Mahjong
description:
Description

Midas Mahjong is a classic puzzle using the Chinese Mahjong tiles that are laid out in a pyramid form. Combine two tiles of the same type to clear them away and work your way through the pyramid. Only the master has the concentration needed to clear all the tiles in time.

Instructions

  1. The goal is to clear away all the Mah Jong tiles in the pyramid by pairing together tiles with the same symbols 1 and 1. There are 4 tiles of each type.
  2. To remove tiles click on the first tile in the pair you want to remove with your mouse, then click on the second one.
  3. The tiles may be moved only if:
  4. No other tile covers them
  5. They are lying with no tile either directly to the left or the right of them; one side has to be at the edge of the pyramid.

name: Midas Miner
description:
Description

This is the treasure hunter’s dream - a mine full of jewels! In Midas Miner you have to switch the places of jewels to create rows and columns of same colour jewels. As the jewels you mine disappear, new jewels fall down from above. Plan to create valuable combinations and you might end up collecting all the money!

Instructions

  1. The idea behind Midas Miner is to switch the places of two jewels to create rows and columns of 3 or more of the same jewel to clear them.
  2. As the jewels you clear disappear, new jewels fall down to fill their place. Clear as many jewels as you can within the time limit.
  3. To switch a pair of jewels you click on them with your left mouse button. As your click on the second jewel you they will automatically start to switch places. You can only switch jewels that are touching horisontally or vertically.

name: Midas Solitaire
description:
Description

Solitaire is based on the world’s most popular solitaire card game Klondike. The goal of Solitaire is to move all the 52 cards up to the foundation to clear the starting lay-up as quickly as possible. If you play your cards right you can solve the lay up and avoid getting stuck.

Instructions

  1. The goal of Solitaire is to move all of the 52 cards up to the four foundation piles, thereby clearing the starting lay-up as quickly as possible.
  2. You place a card on any other card in the tableau columns by building downward and alternating colours between black and red.
  3. To remove the cards from the tableau columns you move them to the foundation. Each pile in the foundation has to start with the Ace of the corresponding card suit, and follow that suit upwards.

name: Miner Speed
description:
Description

In this Speed version, you only have one minute to get the highest score possible. Switch the jewels and increase your multiplier by making big combinations. Colour bombs, explosions and the Last Blast are other features of this frantic game.

Instructions

  1. Switch places of the jewels by clicking and dragging one jewel to the other, vertically or horizontally.
  2. Make combinations of 4 or 5 jewels to get explosions, cross blasts or colour bombs.
  3. Create long chains to get shiny multipliers. Collect multiplier jewels with colour bombs, cross blasts or explosions.

name: Model Studio
description:
Description

A model needs her hair done, her nails done, her clothing picked, her hair dyed, and her make-up done and her poses perfected before she is ready for the photoshoot. Are you ready to take care of the models?

Instructions

  1. Move around the models by dragging them with your mouse. Make sure that they pass the stations they need to pass before you send them to the photoshoot.
  2. Keep the models happy by not letting them wait for too long, and not putting them at the wrong stations.
  3. If a model is happy enough when she goes to her photoshoot, she will give you valuable points. If she's not happy, she will fail and be sent home, giving you nothing!

name: Monkey Quest
description:
Description

The Monkey needs to burst the bubbles in order to find the golden statue. Three different types of mini-games are located underground, and he has to release the stars to get there!

Instructions

  1. Shoot the bubbles to create groups of 3 or more of the same colour. Release the star bubbles to enter a mini-game.
  2. There are three mini-games, all distinctly different: Survival, Mining and Marksman.
  3. The key to a good score is to make few shots and perform well in the mini-games, creating a golden statue in the end!

name: Orchido
description:
Description

Rotate the flowers to create groups of 3 or more of the same kind and they will disappear! Use powerups to convert the barren Black Seeds into valuable Golden Seeds that will unlock even more flower types!

Instructions

  1. Click a group of flowers to rotate them one step.
  2. Create a group of 3 touching flowers of the same kind to make them disappear.
  3. There are three powerups: One bomb, one line blast and one colour bomb.

name: Papa Pear
description:
Description

Try to make each Papa Pear shot bounce on as many objects as possible. Land a Papa Pear in each Barrel to advance to the next level.

Instructions

  1. Try to make each Papa Pear bounce on as many objects as possible to earn points.
  2. Try to land Papa Pear in each Barrel and advance to next level, new levels means more things to bounce on = more points.
  3. Try to catch all multiplier pegs because this will increase your multiplier and thereby your score.

name: Pepper Panic
description:
Description

Create rows or columns with 3 or more peppers of the same colour to make them grow. Try to make the peppers grow to their full size and start burning chain reactions.

Instructions

  1. Create rows or columns with 3 or more peppers of the same colour to make them grow.
  2. Click or drag peppers to make them switch places.
  3. Try to make the peppers grow to their full size and start burning chain reactions.

name: Pet Rescue
description:
Description

Several dogs, cats and birds have been trapped in a burning building, and it is up to you to rescue them! You have fire extinguishers and helicopters to aid you, but your supply is limited!

Instructions

  1. Click a group of two or more crates of the same colour to remove them. Make large groups to score points.
  2. Try to get the animals out of the crates and down to the ground. You also have a limited number of helicopters.
  3. You get fire extinguishers for making large groups. Use them to put out the fires by clicking them before they spread!

name: Polar Bear Bounce
description:
Description

It is up to you to save the poor Polar bears by bouncing them into the doors and stop them from falling into the ice cold ocean. Draw trampolines with your mouse to bounce them with the right angle and keep them from the hungry killer whales. A cute game that gives you a unique and fun challenge over many levels.

Instructions

  1. You have to save the falling polar bears from plunging into the dangerous artic ocean. Use your mouse to draw trampolines in the air to try to bounce the polar bears into one of the doors to save them. You control the angle of the trampolines and can use this to make the polar bears change direction as they fall.
  2. On each level you have a target of a number of polar bears you need to save before time runs out. Every polar bear you send into a door adds to your save count and losing a polar bears to the ocean deducts from your count. If you reach the target you will progress to the next level.
  3. Send the polar bears into a doorway of the same colour to get the maximum score from each polar bear you save. Pick up power ups by bouncing a polar bear into them to help you on your way.

name: Pool King
description:
Description

Pool King puts your pool playing skills to the test. Make quick and accurate shots to sink the balls, pocket the 9-Ball as fast as possible to collect that valuable bonus. Pool is a simple and fun pool game for the solo player.

Instructions

  1. Play according to the 9-ball Pool rules. With each shot you have to first hit the lowest numbered ball on the table. The game is over when you sink the 9-ball.
  2. Use your mouse to rotate your cue stick and aim the shot. Press down the left mouse button and pull back to add strength to the shot. Relase button to shoot.
  3. Sink the 9-ball as early as possible by using a lower numbered ball to put it in a pocket to maximize your bonus and score.

name: Pop Painter
description:
Description

Can you become a famous painting artist? Colour the canvas by popping the balls of paint and create works of art that are totally unique!

Instructions

  1. Aim and shoot with your mouse
  2. Every time two balls collide, they increase in size.
  3. When they are big enough, or hit a razor, they will burst!

name: Princess Peony
description:
Description

Place three or more figures of same type next to each and earn hearts. Fill the love meter with hearts to finish the level.

Instructions

  1. In this game you should try to place three or more figures of the same type next to each other.
  2. This will make them transform to their ”next” form and release “Love” in the form of hearts into the kingdom.
  3. Fill the love meter with hearts to finish the level.

name: Puzzle Mana
description:
Description

You're a young magician with a taste for adventure. You have set out on a quest to face the most powerful creatures in the physical and magical realms. Charge your arcane spells to unleash the might of your magical mana!

Instructions

  1. Drag the symbols to make groups of 3 or more of the same type.
  2. Look at the meters on the left and match the symbols you need to fill them all.
  3. The powerups can help you fill the meters quicker, but the skulls can drain a meter completely!

name: Pyramid
description:
Description

The addictive international hit you just cannot stop playing. In Pyramid the aim is to clear as many card lay-ups as possible by removing all the cards in the Pyramid. Just pick a card that is one value higher or lower to clear them. Collect golden scarabs to unlock new chapters in the story and to reveal the secret ending.

Instructions

  1. Clear as many pyramids as possible by removing the cards one by one before you run through your deck of cards or out of time.
  2. To clear away cards from the pyramid they have to be one value higher or lower than the open card of the pile. So on a 4 you can place either a 3 or a 5, and so on.
  3. You move cards from the pyramid by clicking on them with your left mouse button. If a card is free to move it will get highlighted when you move your mouse over it. Click the scarabs in the end sequence to unlock new chapters.

name: Pyramid Quest
description:
Description

The addictive international hit you just cannot stop playing. The aim is to clear as many card lay-ups as possible by removing all the cards. Just pick a card that is one value higher or lower to clear them and you might get all the God Stones. In Pyramid Quest, every level is different!

Instructions

  1. Clear as many levels as possible by removing the cards one by one before you run through your deck of cards or out of time.
  2. To clear away cards from the pyramid they have to be one value higher or lower than the open card of the pile. So on a 4 you can place either a 3 or a 5, and so on.
  3. You don't have to remove all cards, on some levels the god stones can be uncovered without removing them all.

This game is only available to members. Sign up above to play now for free.

name: Pyramid Speed
description:
Description

Enter the Pyramid and create series of cards to reach the Scarabs. You have one minute to unravel the mysteries of the pharaoh's tomb, speed is of the essence!

Instructions

  1. Place a card that is one value higher or lower on the open card.
  2. Clear many cards in a single sequence to increase your score multiplier.
  3. Unleash the scarabs by removing certain cards. The scarabs give you special advantages.

name: Rainbow Rescue
description:
Description

Create Rainbows by grouping Rainies together. Fill all the colours in the rainbow, but don't forget to pick up the sky coins on the way! Make special combos with the mini-rainbows to fill an entire colour quickly!

Instructions

  1. Fill the Rainbow by clicking groups of same-coloured Rainies. Bigger groups fill the rainbow more quickly.
  2. When a colour in the rainbow has been filled, groups of that colour will give you almost no points for the rest of the level.
  3. Mini- Rainbows can be used to connect groups of Rainies, and can be used together for special combos.

name: Royale 55
description:
Description

Royale 55 is a Poker based solitaire game where the aim is to create 11 poker hands out of the 55 cards. The deck consists of the 52 standard cards plus 3 Wild cards that can count as any card. Cover of all hands of Poker and you will end up the champion in this skillful game.

Instructions

  1. Royale 55 is a Poker based solitaire game where the aim is to create the best 11 poker hands out of the 55 cards. The deck consists of the 52 standard cards plus 3 Wild cards.
  2. Move each row sideways to create your hand in the center column and then Submit the hand. Continue to make hands until you have used the whole deck, but time is limited.
  3. Click and hold down the mouse button to slide a row with your mouse. Release when the position is right. Try to make as many different hands as possible for a big bonus.

name: Scopa King
description:
Description

Scopa King is our version of the traditional card game. You must outsmart the computer opponent in a quick game. Grab the King of coins and Seven of Coins for bonus points, and as many Scopas as possible!

Instructions

  1. You will always start the game, and play a single round against the computer opponent.
  2. Capture cards by clicking the cards you want and then dragging your card to them.
  3. You get points for most cards, most coin cards, getting the Re Bello and Sette Bello, the highest primiera and every Scopa.

name: Scrapbook Detective
description:
Description

You need to know what you are looking for in this Seek & Find game. Every location hides a number of objects, and it is up to you to find them! Find them all, and you will qualify for the bonus mini-game!

Instructions

  1. Read what items you need at the bottom of the screen, and click them in any order.
  2. You get a score penalty every time you click on items that are not listed.
  3. Click "Hint" if you cannot find an object, but this will cost you valuable points.

name: Seashell Speed
description:
Description

Switch the seashells quickly and match them by colour to make the sea floor less crowded. As you remove seashells, the playing area will contract and make it harder and harder to find matches. Be quick, you only have a minute!

Instructions

  1. Click two seashells to make them switch places. Create lines of three or more of the same colour to remove them.
  2. When a column is empty, the play area will contract, making it harder to create matches.
  3. There are four powerups: Bombs, column blasts, colour blasts and multipliers. Use them wisely!

This game is only available to members. Sign up above to play now for free.

name: Seashell Squeeze
description:
Description

In the depths of the sea, the seashells stack up. Switch them and match them by colour to make the sea floor less crowded. As you remove seashells, the playing area will contract and make it harder and harder to find matches...

Instructions

  1. Click two seashells to make them switch places. Create lines of three or more of the same colour to remove them
  2. When a column is empty, the play area will contract, making it harder to create matches.
  3. There are three powerups: Bombs, column blasts and colour blasts. Use them wisely!

name: Silver Screen
description:
Description

A unique game that is like no other puzzle challenge. Create matching row of the same colour of the 2 coloured blocks. Switch the blocks or just turn them inside out! Use the rainbows and bombs to make swift progress and listen to the music your combinations makes.

Instructions

  1. In Silver Screen all cubes have two colours; an outer layer and a second colour as inner layer. Only the outer colour is active and can create combinations of 3 matching cubes.
  2. You can switch places on two touching cubes OR switch the inner and outer colours on any two colured cube to create rows or column of 3 or more cubes of the same outer colour.
  3. Rainbow cubes can be matched with any colour and release a Fire cube to blast away a layer on all touching cubes.

name: Solitaire Swing
description:
Description

This golf-inspired Solitaire is packed with action! Create hands before the cards reach the bottom, and make sure to meet the par on each hole!

Instructions

  1. Match the falling cards with the stock cards at the bottom. Cards can be matched in ascending or descending order, regardless of colour.
  2. This means that a King can be matched with an Ace or a Queen, and so on. When you have reached the number of cards shown on the flag, you can submit the hand.
  3. You get a higher score for submitting your hands before they fall too far, and for submitting longer hands. If a card falls below the bottom, the game is over.

name: Spider King
description:
Description

Spider King is based on one of the most popular solitaires, and it is as addictive as ever! Create sequences from King to Ace and they will magically disappear!

Instructions

  1. All cards are of the same suit, so all you need to worry about is making sequences from King to Ace.
  2. When you have created a full sequence of cards, they will disappear. Create eight sequences to solve the game.
  3. All cards can be placed in the empty slots, but you cannot deal new cards while you have empty slots.

name: Sudoku Sweep
description:
Description

In Sudoku Sweep you get use your Sudoku thinking skills together with strategic planning. Place the falling numbers according to the Sudoku rules and try to make as many rows, columns and combinations as possible. Only the best players will manage to fill the full board.

Instructions

  1. The number tiles fall in from above. Place them from the bottom up so that no number 1 through 9 is placed more than once in and row, column or 3x3 box. You are only allowed to make three mistakes. Wild tiles have no value and can be placed anywhere without breaking the Sudoku rules.
  2. You control the game with your keyboard. Move the falling tiles sideway with the Left and Right arrow, and make them fall faster with the Down arrow. Use the Space bar to make a tile fall all the way down instantly.
  3. You get bonus point for making a full row, column or 3x3 box. You also get a bonus for making a vertical or horizontal triple, which is using the same number in three 3x3 boxes, so that it is never represented by a wild tile. This also converts the 3 tiles into wild tiles, which makes your life easier later in the game. The Golden tiles raise the scores of any combination you make.

name: Top Ace
description:
Description

Play up to three exciting games of tennis against the best players in the world. Can you get all the aces up to the top? Then you will qualify for the final and become the Top Ace!

Instructions

  1. The goal of this game is to get all the aces in the top positions.
  2. Click a card to remove it from the tennis court. You can only remove cards if you have a higher card of the same suite open.
  3. You have a bag with four slots where you can store cards. To bring back a card from the bag, you need to empty a whole column.

name: Twist Me Silly
description:
Description

It’s always silly season down in Uncle Berry’s woods and he needs your help to gather all the tasty berries. All you have to do is connect three or more berries of the same colour. When you create long chains special berries appear, which will help you collect even more delicious berry treats.

Instructions

  1. Click on the berries to rotate them. Connect three berries of the same kind and – way-hay! – they’ll disappear!
  2. Make long chains of matches to create the special berries.
  3. When you’ve cleared the required number of berries, you get to move on to the next level, where all berries cleared will earn you more points.

name: Word Link
description:
Description

A classic word game puzzle where you have to compose as many words as you can by combining the letters. New letters appear to challenge your language skill and finding long words creates special tiles for you to use. Start linking!

Instructions

  1. Link the letter tiles into as many words as you can before time runs out. As you form words new tiles fill out the game field.
  2. Click on the letter tiles with your left mouse button in sequence to spell out the word. The letter tiles have to be touching to be linkable. Only words with between 3-10 tiles are accepted.
  3. Long words and high value letter tiles raise your word score. Use the bonus tiles for the valuable score multipliers.

name: Word Seance
description:
Description

Use the given letters to type words in English, German, French, Swedish, Dutch, Danish and Italian. The faster you are, the higher your score will be. Keep the link to the spirit world intact, or your bones will be chilled by the laugh of Death.

Instructions

  1. Use the letters on your keyboard to type, and press enter to send the word.
  2. All words in English, German, French, Swedish, Dutch, Danish and Italian.are accepted. If you type a word a second time in the same game, you will not get any points for it.
  3. Meet the level requirement, or lose one of your lives. You start out with two lives, shown as stones in the lower right corner. Don't lose them, or the game will be over!

name: Yo-yo Jackpot
description:
Description

Use your Yo-yo to clear the balls! Make it through the levels, where trains of many-coloured balls flow around you in every direction.

Instructions

  1. Aim with your mouse, and Josie will automatically rotate.
  2. Use your yo-yo to remove balls. When three or more balls come together, they burst.
  3. Fill the meter by bursting bubbles, and try to use as few shots as possible!
